newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Steck-Vaughn forecast cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Steck-Vaughn forecast cut.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Joseph Arsenio cut his 1997 revenue and earnings estimates for Steck-Vaughn Publishing Corp based on decreased expectations for its Edunetics and Summit Learning business units.
-- Arsenio reduced his 1997 revenue estimate to $99.8 million from $101.8 million, and cut his earnings forecast to $0.64 a share from $0.71.
-- Steck-Vaughn recently reported fourth quarter earnings of $0.07 a share, up from $0.04 a year earlier.
